Reviews.Title: “great value for money!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights fashioned italian hotel refurbishment positive bed firm matteress europeans bathroomshower spotlessly clean clean towels everyday hot water morning night yes hotel nearly excellent buffet breakfast fresh coffee milk mobile 4th floor negotiate 20 steps half board evening meal fine 4 courses modest portions cant complain 20 euro bottle wine 22 euros found staff professional helpful comfortable female solo traveller location 12 minute walk piazzale roma easy crossing bridgethe lit vaporetto stops 100 metres hotel 25 minute walk san marco sleep wherever venice noise wear earplugs church wake door 0700 dont dislikes hotel hotel exchange money dont commission budget hotel tips vaporetto stops piazzale roma post office coop supermarket 0830 2000 everyday dont close lunch secondly buy vaporetto pass 72 hours 7 days save loads money 1900 vaporetti arent busy evening tour canals especially grande canale wonderful
